Container.Name: Unraid Duplicate File Handler
Container.Overview: A web-based tool designed for Unraid to identify and clean up duplicate files across array disks. Compare files by relative path, review keep/delete decisions, and either move or delete them with full progress feedback. Ideal for cleaning up after interrupted Unbalance runs or manual copy operations.

Variable.Name: SECRET_KEY
Variable.Description: Random 32-character string used for session security. Recommended: run `python -c "import secrets; print(secrets.token_hex(16))"` to generate.

Volume.Description: Read/write access to Unraid array disks for moving and deleting files
App output and persistent scan/cleanup results
